title: icopress
author: icopress
created_time: February 01, 2023, 06:38:36 PMLast edit: August 23, 2023, 11:46:28 AM by icopress
content: Quote from:  ‚û• Bitcointalk Quiz [Live]  ‚û• Last year's [Results]   ‚û• Ledger Nano X  [Free Raffle]  & [Visit Channel] BitcoinTalkShow Craft Master ¬† Jayce ¬†Hero of GoodtheymosDiscoveryPowerGloveBitcointalk NinjaTryNinjaSpamBusterGazetaBitcoin Miss BitcointalkFoxpup________________________ ScamBuster ¬†lovesmayfamilis________________________ Bitcoin Geeko_e_l_e_o________________________ Golden Featherfillippone________________________ AntiheroRoyse777________________________Summing up the Bitcointalk Awards 2022, I would like to express my gratitude to everyone who took part in the voting, as well as to everyone who supported this initiative. Congratulations to all the winners (we have thirty winners this year) and thank you to everyone who continues to make Bitcointalk better.Year after year we repeat that public recognition is the most prestigious award, but we also want to give the winners modest prizes sponsored by ü¶ä Betnomi and Cryptios. All the winners will be sent some bitcoins and those of you who won first place will receive a Custom Cold Wallet and a collectible item in addition (to everyone who believes that their privacy will not be violated and those in whose countries international delivery works).Prize distribution [more details can be found [here]].Code:theymos - 12 mBTCLoyceV - 18 mBTCThe Scyptical Chymist - 3 mBTCHhampuz - 9 mBTCJayce - 12 mBTCTryNinja - 12 mBTCRatimov - 6 mBTCDd–ºrDdmr - 3 mBTCo_e_l_e_o - 12 mBTCFillippone - 12 mBTCachow101 - 6 mBTCJayJuanGee - 3 mBTCPowerGlove - 12 mBTCn0nce - 6 mBTCcitboin - 3 mBTCGazetaBitcoin - 12 mBTClovesmayfamilis - 21 mBTCexemplens - 6 mBTCSFR1o - 3 mBTCRoyse77 - 12 mBTCfranky - 6 mBTCJollyGood - 3 mBTCFoxpup - 12 mBTCsuchmoon - 3 mBTCCustom Cold Wallet for 1st place WinnersQuoteAdditional Prizes for 1st place WinnersQuoteQuote from: CryptiosWe're excited to sponsor this event by offering each winner a special edition of the upcoming Open Mic Forum - Gicl√©e fine art print on high quality Hahnemuelhe paper. Each print is unique, featuring the respective winners and categories for the Bitcointalk Community Awards 2022. Congratulations to the winners and hope you will enjoy this 60cm/24'' wide small ¬†token of appreciation. [1] Delivery of Custom Cold Wallets starts after they arrive at MJ.[2] I want to express my special thanks to GazetaBitcoin, Cyrus & Sorsis as he did a great job for you guys to see the results of the vote.Quote from: Mr.XMade with üíó for the Bitcointalk public.

duesoldi, FatFork, lucius, ScamViruS, Shasan, Stalker22,cygan, jack0m, jeremypwr, LegendaryK, xhomer10, CR02, cryptofrka, irfan_pak10, MrCryptHodl, Shahzadafzal, so98nn, Trofo, Yatsan, BADecker, FortuneJack,larry_vw_1955, MikeJ_NpC, QuestionAuthority, Quickseller, nullius, Lesbian Cow, BitcoinBunny, Disruptivas, Fattcatt, Helena Yu, Majestic_milf, mk4, Sandra_hakeem, womanderfulStatistics:this year we had 166 unique users nominated for 10 categories. Excepting them, some were also nominated as being event or fail of the year Oothe greatest number of nominations received by a user was 87the biggest difference between a first place and a second place was 62 votesfranky1 tried to abuse the system, by meriting 2 of those who nominated him as antihero, in order to have less votes at this category (facepalm)some users had their votes denied for breaking the "no-merit rule" (such examples are minerjones, which has 2 votes unaccounted, for giving merits to those nominating him (link 1, link 2) or ChiBitCTy, which has one vote denied, for same reason (link))votes of Atikah92, BTC_Mouse, burugcrypto, PaperWallet, Popkon6, halim50_ and Rbolisna were not counted, as they have less than 50 merits5 votes for satoshi, 4 for Lauda and 1 for asu were also not counted, due to their inactivitysome mentions of event / fail of the year were also not counted, as they written with words which did not make any sense ("FAILED TO EARN AND HOLD 1btc", "Situaci√≥n Actual", "Cancel Culture on social media", "Some exchanges are at war", "Get Your Funds Out of Exchange", "BUY THE DIP AND HODL")some votes for nominees which had their name written wrong were merged together (Lafu & Lafu01, Majestic_milf & Majestic_miff, The Sceptical Chymist & The Pharmacist, Timelord2067 & TimeLord, fillippone & Phillippone etc.)

comments.author: icopress
comments.body: I would appreciate it if the winners would post their bitcoin addresses here.I will process payments by Monday (or when I have a complete list)

comments.author: The Sceptical Chymist
comments.body: LOL.¬† I didn't even realize the bitcointalk Youtube channel got any votes for Failure of the Year.¬† Ouch.A'ight I didn't want votes or to win anything, but I'm no sucker and will gratefully accept my 3rd place win:bc1qhaxv7dathsjwfpyntfep5rl475cfuygatmu0z4Congrats to all the winners!¬† It was a shitty year overall, but at least this contest was some fun.

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: Congrats to all the winners!!! You all deserved every nomination. Can't wait to see what the next contest brings.

comments.author: Coyster
comments.body: Congratulations to all the winners, this contest never disappoints in bringing the community together, and this one didn't too. Well Done icopress and GazetaBitcoin for the seamless organization of this Bitcointalk award show yet again. Great gesture from the sponsors as well: Betnomi and Cryptios, to add rewards to it. Thank you all.I know some of the first place winners woudn't accept the physical items they've won for privacy reasons, it is what it is, and as Bitcoiners it is completely understandable, but it is great there's a Bitcoin reward, and of course no problem about privacy violation on that one (part of the reason we love Bitcoin eh ). Cheers guys!

comments.author: CryptoPanda
comments.body: Thank you icopress and GazetaBitcoin, last year‚Äôs award had the most unbiased voting process since three years. Everything went smoothly. Congratulations to all the winners. Well deserved. I see we have some winners again from the same category as the previous year, maybe we should have an award for two-time bitcointalk award winners

comments.author: salad daging
comments.body: Finally, we can see a list of some of the winners of this bitcointalk community award contest. We appreciate and appreciate what GazetaBitcoin and icopress are doing, as well as the sponsors to support this event.Once again congrats to the winners the community voted for the nominees by their votes meaning that they are very enthusiastic about this way.But is this event really going to happen every year?Just want to know.

comments.author: Hhampuz
comments.body: Great event, nice to see so many different winners! Well deserved to you all and finally jayce takes home the craft master category - can't think of anyone who deserves it more. I bet I don't only speak for myself when I say that a lot of campaigns/promos and similar here on bitcointalk would not run without your amazing graphics jayce.Thank you to organizers, apologies for not getting my votes in but looking at the totals it would have made no difference.Please give my winnings to jayce, he deserves it

comments.author: AverageGlabella
comments.body: Congrats to all the winners and runners up! I hope we can see some new people in the future because the same names are on there from last years. Maybe a way of not removing votes for these members but only counting 1/2 of a point for each vote? We might get some new members that were runners up and unlucky because of popularity.

comments.author: PowerGlove
comments.body: Congrats to the other 29 winners!Thanks @icopress, @GazetaBitcoin, @Cyrus, @Sorsis, Betnomi and Cryptios!I can't accept the physical prizes, but I'll happily take the BTC: bc1q2yz2gmgt9yz2z0rl2r72tdlfany5uqs397996a This award (really) means a lot to me, and I hope I can find ways to add value to the forum for many years to come. Thanks, everyone!

comments.author: 1miau
comments.body: Wow, great list and I guess it took some effort and time to count all votes. ¬†Congratulations to all winners! I've presented the result already in our German topic here as citb0in from our local board has won a small prize in "Discovery of the year". Maybe you could correct his name, looks like a small typo in his name: ¬†Quote from: GazetaBitcoin on February 01, 2023, 08:46:07 PMcitb0oin Many thanks @icopress and @GazetaBitcoin for managing our 2022 Bitcointalk Community Awards and Betnomi + Cryptios for a very generous sponsorship! I'm already looking forward to our next round.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Wow, what an interesting surprise. I really didn't expect it.I have to thank the organizers too @icopress and @GazetaBitcoin for managing this community awards, and sponsors as well. of course, everyone who participated in the vote.My BTC addy: 3FWdmutJ8pqH9D3VNd7j2BLBUXJv49qZxWthx.

comments.author: Lafu
comments.body: Congratulations to all that have won in each category and also to the ones that made the second and third place , you are all winners ! As 1miau have written already im happy to read that one of our Local Board ( citb0in ) has made it to the 3rd place in "Discovery of the year"Saddly it was not possible for me to get a spot in the 2 categories i was nominated , but to be on the List is already a honor and maybe next year i have a chance.Congrats to @icopress and @GazetaBitcoin for an awesome Contest , i looking forward to next year !

comments.author: Foxpup
comments.body: Oh, yeah. I've still got it. Send the prize to 1PSrpqmMzyaPWDLhCyXYKwa1wyYoLV6QQe.Congratulations to all the other winners, condolences to all the losers, and thanks to everyone who participated. As always, it was fun!

comments.author: aylabadia05
comments.body: Quote from: icopress on February 01, 2023, 06:38:36 PM[Results 2022] Bitcointalk Community Awards üèÜCongratulations to all the winning participants in this great contest.All the winners selected by category in my opinion deserve the award. But there was one that made me smile when I saw Foxpup who was selected in the Miss Bitcointalk category. Really interesting.My appreciation to icopress as the owner of innovation in making this contest.Hopefully this year (2023) there will be new things that bring a lot of innovation.Congratulations to everyone.Regards,aylabadia05

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: GazetaBitcoin on February 01, 2023, 08:46:07 PMFoxpup ü¶ä (47), lovesmayfamilis (22), suchmoon (13), BitcoinGirl.Club (12), sheenshane (6), SatoPrincess (5), 5Ksana_HandMade (4), LoyceV (4), yahoo2278 (3)Oh my goodness, I was close to have a place. Seriously there are no point to have Miss bitcointalk category anymore. We don't know anyone's true gender. A nick is not enough to judge the sex of a user. Hero of Good, Golden Feather, Bitcointalk Ninja, Bitcoin Geek, Discovery of the Year, Craft Master, Antihero, Event of the Year, Fail of the Year are some well deserved categories.I can imagine it's a lot of work for team GazetaBitcoin and icopress. They deserve applaud, perhaps some recognition too only because hosting the event and volunteering for it.Overall it's fun to see this event for last few years. Congratulations to the winners.

comments.author: citb0in
comments.body: A BIG THANKS to @icopress and @GazetaBitcoin for organizing, distributing wins and managing something like this. Many thanks also to @1miau, who is doing an exemplary and unrestricted job not only for the German sub-area. Thanks to all supporters and also a thank you to all winners who make a great contribution to enrich the forum qualitatively and help other readers.Please send my winnings to the address --> bc1qqnrjshpjpypepxvuagatsqqemnyetsmvzqnafhThank you.citb0in

comments.author: Merit.s
comments.body: Congratulations to all the winners,you have done so much and have also contributed to see the forum grow in your various ways. The price is a way to encourage you to continue with your good work and your tired less effort in the community is noticed by forum members. Those other people who didn't get a price due to the low vote count, don't be discouraged,you are still recognized and don't be discouraged,maybe next time you might fall in the prize positions.Keep it up everyone.¬† @Ico press and @GazetaBitcoin,you the men

comments.author: bullrun2024bro
comments.body: Quote from: icopress on February 01, 2023, 06:38:36 PM~Congrats to all the winners! Very well deserved. And of course a big thank you to @icopress, @GazetaBitcoin, @Cyrus & @Sorsis for the great organization of the event and counting the votes. I am looking forward to the next round in 2023. These community events are always big fun! Thumbs up!
